subject: Questions about ordering and shipping goods
description_text:
Hello!

I would like to know the order number of my order and the tracking number
if it has been sent. Please reply by e-mail.

And please check the attached picture.

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi 임동권,  We apologize for the delay in shipping to our partner. The original estimated date was the 15th, but it has now been adjusted to the 20th. Rest assured, all products are ready and will be shipped as soon as they pass quality inspection.

Hello,

I would like to request the cancellation of my order and a full refund.

Due to unexpected shipping delays, I am no longer able to wait for the
delivery,
and I have decided to cancel this order.
Since the item has not yet been delivered, I kindly ask you to cancel the
shipment and process the refund.

Thank you for your understanding.
I look forward to your confirmation.

2025년 12월 17일 (수) AM 11:31, support@simsonn.com
Hi 임동권,    We have processed your refund. We apologize for the delay in addressing your request.
